revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

div.p: ... for the ... according to a public ... to appear (before a magistrate) instead of me ... Ptolemaios from a petition ... and his note of hand ... to have against him ... you ... interest ... he has ... upon subscription ... and his note of hand ... When I myself arrived in Arsinoe, I received from you the money and his note of hand. I acknowledge at once to not bring suit against you concerning these things and ... to have received these things. And I will hand over ... without reservation your subscriptions which I received, ... to not have complaints and to not bring suit concerning any matter ... being invalid ... of the note of hand. Eighth year of NN Caesar the lord, Pharmouthi 15.
